Otherworldly Pulse.name: Otherworldly Pulse
Otherworldly Pulse.fullText:
Impure Scion Attack 11Otherworldly Pulse

You channel the corruption of the Far Realm to attack the minds of nearby creatures and leave them reeling.

Encounter        Augmentable, Psionic, Psychic
Standard Action      Close burst 2

Target: Each creature in the burst

Attack: Constitution, Intelligence, or Charisma + 6 vs. Will
Level 21: Constitution, Intelligence, or Charisma + 9 vs. Will

Hit: 4d6 + Constitution modifier, Intelligence modifier, or Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn. If the target is aberrant, it takes 2d6 extra psychic damage.
Level 21: 6d6 + Constitution modifier, Intelligence modifier, or Charisma modifier psychic damage.

Special: When you gain this power, choose Constitution, Intelligence, or Charisma as the ability you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.

Augment 2

Range: Close burst 3

Target: Each enemy in the burst


Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 129.
Otherworldly Pulse.flavor: You channel the corruption of the Far Realm to attack the minds of nearby creatures and leave them reeling.
Otherworldly Pulse.attack:
Constitution, Intelligence, or Charisma + 6 vs. Will
Level 21: Constitution, Intelligence, or Charisma + 9 vs. Will
Otherworldly Pulse.onHit:
4d6 + Constitution modifier, Intelligence modifier, or Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn. If the target is aberrant, it takes 2d6 extra psychic damage.
Level 21: 6d6 + Constitution modifier, Intelligence modifier, or Charisma modifier psychic damage.
Otherworldly Pulse.special: When you gain this power, choose Constitution, Intelligence, or Charisma as the ability you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.

Appalling Transformation.name: Appalling Transformation
Appalling Transformation.fullText:
Impure Scion Attack 20Appalling Transformation

You call forth the contamination of the Far Realm, transforming an enemy into a creature too awful to behold.

Daily        Polymorph, Psionic, Psychic
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Constitution, Intelligence, or Charisma + 9 vs. Fortitude. If the target is aberrant, you have combat advantage for this attack.

Hit: 2d6 + Constitution modifier, Intelligence modifier, or Charisma modifier damage.

Effect: The target assumes the form of the appalling transformation (save ends). While in this form, the target is dazed, slowed, and takes ongoing 15 psychic damage. Creatures not immune to fear take a -2 penalty to attack rolls for attacks that include the target.

  Aftereffect: The target takes 10 damage.

Special: When you gain this power, choose Constitution, Intelligence, or Charisma as the ability you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.


Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 129.
Appalling Transformation.flavor: You call forth the contamination of the Far Realm, transforming an enemy into a creature too awful to behold.
Appalling Transformation.attack: Constitution, Intelligence, or Charisma + 9 vs. Fortitude. If the target is aberrant, you have combat advantage for this attack.
Appalling Transformation.onHit: 2d6 + Constitution modifier, Intelligence modifier, or Charisma modifier damage.
Appalling Transformation.effect: The target assumes the form of the appalling transformation (save ends). While in this form, the target is dazed, slowed, and takes ongoing 15 psychic damage. Creatures not immune to fear take a -2 penalty to attack rolls for attacks that include the target.
Appalling Transformation.special: When you gain this power, choose Constitution, Intelligence, or Charisma as the ability you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.

Strange Anatomy.name: Strange Anatomy
Strange Anatomy.fullText:
Impure Scion Utility 12Strange Anatomy

The corruption of your body absorbs the worst of an attack.

Encounter        Psionic
Immediate Interrupt      Personal

Trigger: You take damage from an attack

Effect: You take half damage from the triggering attack. If the triggering attack is a critical hit, it turns into a normal hit.


Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 129.
Strange Anatomy.flavor: The corruption of your body absorbs the worst of an attack.
Strange Anatomy.trigger: You take damage from an attack
Strange Anatomy.effect: You take half damage from the triggering attack. If the triggering attack is a critical hit, it turns into a normal hit.
